title: Lauren Roxburgh
itunes:title: Lauren Roxburgh
description: On today’s episode, Lauren Roxburgh “The Body Whisperer” shares her journey to true well-being. From establishing the Aligned Life Studio, to writing her second book The Power Source, Lauren walks us through developing the mind/body connection to live an empowered and positive life - move, nourish, cleanse, connect.
